name: The Black Plague
description:
A project I developed as part of a unit during my college course.

The game is very similar in terms of mechanics to Plague Inc. which was the main inspiration for my project. The main difference between The Black Plague and Plague Inc. is the setting, as TBP is set in the late middle ages, as you may have guessed from the title. 

The main objective of the game is to infect and kill as much of the population as possible within a time-frame of 100 in-game days. You can mutate your virus to add symptoms or perks within certain climates and development levels to help you conquer humanity.

Controls:

Camera movement: WASD

Pause: Escape

Some minor features had to be scrapped, as well as sound effects, and some visual feedback had to be reduced due to time constraints.

I might update this project once in a while to make it a more enjoyable experience.
